DOC.brief_summary: The propose study randomize , double-blind , parallel-arm study . Participants incorporate snack food ( bar/yogurt ) contain 16 gram fiber ( fructooligosaccharide ) similar snack food without added fiber usual diet . The study period include 2-week pre-baseline assessment period 8-week treatment period . During 2-week pre-baseline period study food consume however dietary intake assess use 24-hour online diet recall program . The first week 8-week treatment serve acclimation period one serving study food give ( 8 gram fiber ) per day . Participants receive two serving ( 16 gram fiber ) per day week 2 8 treatment period 24-hour online diet recall complete week 4 , 6 8 . Hypothesis : Adults age 18 50 year consume usual diet modify incorporate yogurt snack bar contain 16 gram chicory root fiber ( Frutalose® ) decrease usual dietary intake great extent compare participant receive similar snack food without added fiber .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Fiber Snack Foods Dietary Intake Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The description study activity : Screening Period ( approximately 2 week randomization ) : - Obtain height weight - Complete 10-question survey fruit , vegetable , fiber intake - Receive training complete daily questionnaire online - Complete Global Physical Activity Questionnaire . This 16-question survey ask physical activity typical week - Complete Eating Inventory . This 51-question survey ask dietary habit feeling relate food eat - Receive training record dietary intake use ASA24 . The ASA24 web-based interactive program ask record food eat previous day Randomization : - Measure weight , waist circumference , body composition . We use BodPod measure body composition . The BodPod use air displacement measure body volume - Receive dietary counseling incorporate study food current diet . You ask use food replace food currently eat - Consume one study food per day first week 2 food per day week 2 8 . - Complete 10-question online daily survey - Complete 7 day 24-hour dietary recall use ASA24 week 4 , 6 , 8 Final : - Return uneaten study food . - Measure weight , waist circumference , body composition - Complete Global Physical Activity Questionnaire ( GPAQ ) Eating Inventory
DOC.criteria: Adults 18 50 year age Internet access duration protocol BMI 23.0 < 30 kg/m2 Usual fiber intake < 20 g/d base FFQ Block Fruit/Vegetable/Fiber Screener Weight stable ( ±5 lb . last 3 month ) Assessment normal eating determine Eating Inventory Willing eat yogurt granolalike snack bar daily 8 week Willing complete daily questionnaire 28 dietary recall 8 week Habitual breakfast consumer define eat breakfast ( food within 2 hour wake ) 5 day week Willing provide social security number receive study payment Postmenopausal ( selfreported menstrual period one year ) Current smoker tobacco user Based Automated SelfAdministered Diet History ( ASA24 ) dietary intake data collect prebaseline period : Females eat less 1200 kcal/day , male eat less 1500 kcal/day either great 4000 kcal per day , consume average great 10 g dietary fiber/1000 kcal Unwilling discontinue prebiotic fiber supplement , probiotic supplement Antibiotic use within 2 month study start Known food allergy Physiciandiagnosed gastrointestinal disease condition ( ulcerative colitis , Crohn 's disease , gastroparesis , cancer , peptic ulcer disease , Celiac disease , short bowel disease , ileostomy , colostomy GERD , constipation , diverticular disease ) Taking prescribed medication oral contraceptive , seasonal allergy medication , cholesterol blood pressure lower medication , vitamin mineral , baby aspirin Intake > 2 alcoholic drink per day average Purposeful exercise > 300 minute per week average Women lactate know pregnant
